speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Thompson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. I'm calling regarding the outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that. Now, can you also confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. I see here that you have an outstanding balance of $350. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: That’s completely fine. I can assist you with that. What amount can you pay monthly?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I’ll set that up for you starting next month. You will receive confirmation via email.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Sarah! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
